bug.short_desc: qx.ui.core.selection: remove selected items if they are not within selectables list.

long_desc.thetext:
Virtual widgets like list are using qx.ui.core.selection to handle selection behavior. This class knows about select able items. Only them are select able even if more items part of the model.
If you change the model the selectable item list will be updated, but if you selected an item before which is not part of selectables anymore, the item is still in the selection, even if the model don't have the item any more.
This behavior if not logical, because only select able item should be part of selected items. If the model disposes removed items, this items are still persistent cause they are still part of selection.
We should remove items from selection which are not contained be selectables anymore.
